## Description
 Potassium Hydroxide (KOH). Used for&#10;&#9;&#9;liquid soap production. Also for food processing, such as curing olives and making certain types of noodles.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Compound|
|Form:|Solid|
